|brand = Ruckus Wireless |model = ZoneFlex 7441 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = (ZF7441) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = S9GZF7441 |icid = 5912A-ZF7441 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9342; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 533 <!-- 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 54:3D:37 |oui = 54:3D:37
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DAS |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = super |defaultpass = sp-admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/14/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00OY9JTS2 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B00QUEKH58 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Malaysia
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = N-Female |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "PULI", "Â©2013 Ruckus Wireless Inc.", and the ''Ruckus Wireless'' logo :(barking dog) is silkscreened on the board.
The OUI used in the entry (54:3D:37) is per the FCC EUT's sample label and board MAC label. The COO is specified as Malaysia on the FCC sample label. :Default settings are per the FCC QSG.
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Distributed_Antenna_System ''DAS - Distributed Antenna System'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://www.ruckussecurity.com/ZoneFlex-7441.asp ''Ruckus ZoneFlex 7441'' on '''RuckusSecurity''']
==Notes== ===Power adapters=== The power adapters in the FCC docs are.. *for PoE: :'''Ruckus Wireless''' PA1060-480T1A125, P/N: 740-64156-001 :(100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 1.8A -> 48VDC, 1.25A, 60W max.) <!--efficiency level IV--> *for standard use: :'''Ruckus Wireless''' ADS-18C-12N 12018GPCU, P/N: 740-54129-001 :(100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, max. 0.5A -> 12VDC, 1.5A) <!--efficiency level IV-->
==See also== *[[List of Ruckus Wireless Devices]] *[http://sourceforge.net/p/netdisco/mibs/ci/52f0911e42a1a29b6b0fa3f53895543a8c88a5da/tree/ruckus/RUCKUS-PRODUCTS-MIB.txt ''NetDisco'' on '''SF'''] (ZF - ZoneFlex, VF - MediaFlex)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
